reviews.review: Toujours un bon jeux a jouer entre amis
f u n.
muy des balanceado, asesinos camperos en todas las partidas

Absolute classic game. Don't worry about the Killer mains crying the game is too hard. I've got to rank 1 on both killer and survivor and killer is pretty easy cuz you need 0 teamwork and coordination like survivor, I got Rank 1 killer playing pretty casually most the time. Survivor was a bit of a grind solo to Rank 1. Super fun with friends. Only downside is whenever I get too high rank and try to play with low level friends we always get stuck with a sweaty high level killer that makes it not fun for my friends that don't know how to do much and there is no "unrated" lol that and if they happen to be a low level killer getting their ankles broken, expect to get face camped by the angry child.

What is to be expected: 
-Fun time with friends playing casually
-Broken killer perks that don't really get nerfed(sometimes reworked to be a little more fair)
-Face camps - the devs love killers so much they still haven't fixed this in any way or made any penalty for staring a dude down the entire hook time. There is one perk that is absolutely useless besides buying you more hook time if getting camped but doesn't help you get off the hook. The perk is also off a DLC character(it should be a built in mechanic).
-Any new survivor perks that are any-what broken will probably get a nerf shortly after release.
-Pretty fun and easy time as killer until high levels.
-Satisfying solo grind to Rank 1 playing survivor.

Update:

Haven't played the game in a while. Just seems like the game went heavily in the favor of killers now via the fundamentals of the game on top of broken killer perks. Maps are stupid bright now(either inadvertently from brighter texture updates or just on purpose) so hiding outside a closet is near impossible even when my character is blended in well with surroundings and seems like there are like 5 pallets total on every map. I was in a chase for a good minute, used one pallet, and couldn't find another after running to 3 different locations. Killers have broken perks as always but now it just feels like the basic play-style and feel of the game are getting shifted in killers favor. I get taking away vault loops but now there just seems to be no pallets and less closets to hide in.. Matches take forever to find even though they made it ftp on epic recently. 

THERE IS A MAP THAT IS LITERALLY DURING THE DAY. THAT SEEMS SO DUMB AND JUST KILLS THE MOOD OF THE GAME. JUST LOOK AT THE MAIN MENU AND YOU WILL SEE THAT THE CAMPFIRE IS THE SAME BRIGHTNESS AS THE BACKGROUND. IT USED TO BE A CAMPFIRE AT **NIGHT**. HENCE THE NAME DEAD BY DAYLIGHT. SEEMS LIKE THE ONLY THING DEAD BY THE DAYLIGHT WAS THEIR OWN GAME LOL.

Just sucks to love this game and not play for a while just to come back to find the game so heavily tilted to the side of killers. I know it must've been small buffs over and over after a long period of time but when I finally played again my friends and I hated the 2 matches we bared to play it before getting off it.

El juego es bastante entretenido, de verdad te hace sentir como si fueses uno de esos asesinos de las películas clásicas o como un verdadero superviviente que escapa de un gran peligro, si eres un fan de los videojuegos de terror con temática slasher, entonces este juego es para ti.

За Маньяка одно удовольствие играть (за любого). Благодаря этой игре ты открываешь для себя такие понятия как:
+ "кемпинг" (для выживших это когда маньяк повесил на крюк одного и всё ещё находится на карте) :)
+ "тунелинг" (лучше не испытывать ярость выживших в чате после этого и скрыть профиль, а ещё лучше удалить игру) :)
+ "токсичность" (то ради чего ты заходишь в эту игру постоянно и получаешь удовольствие) :)
+ "баланс" (шутка, его нет) :)

I am utterly disgusted by the management of this game. 

I keep loosing rank points on connexion issues that are out of my control or responsibilities. Today, I was in a pretty good game, was doing fine, internet box crash and I'm disconnected from the game. Two rank points lost for that, even though I had no intention to int leave and I was doing fine. 

Game is fine, but devs are not listening to their customers, and can't think of simples solutions to distinguish ragequits/int leaves from players that have real issues and that loose unfairly points on these issues.

I am so disappointed at the game because I waited for 10 minutes without a chance to find a match. It also has lots of buy-in mechanism, which is extremely unfavorable to beginners. Think about that you need to buy lots of characters to get transferable skills. You won't have a good game experience without investing lots of money and time. Also be aware of that this game is completely online. Here comes the problem. You cannot find a match and you cannot enjoy the game alone. This is a dead end.

虽然我是萌新，但是我不能理解为什么我作为一个屠夫，人类在直线平地跑的比我还快，他们能从巴士的模型里面穿过去我不可以，以及突然我就被空无一人的视角里照瞎了，，柜子里跳出的人能把我装晕很久，时间足够修好一台机器加开门然后s四个人围着我跳舞，我都要过一会才能起来，难道不应该我这个屠夫才是强壮的超自然力量吗，四个人在我开年前跑突然四个人的伤口全好了难道他们才是邪神我只是个凡人被他们戏耍吗？而且人类是可以联机的难道不应该因此屠夫要强一点吗。这游戏没饭哇一个弱鸡追四个什么东西能穿墙跑的比你快的东西我想不出胜利的办法

Neyse sonra ise oyuna giriyorum ve bu sefer bana ceza veriyor oyundan ayrıldın diye yani haksız yere boşa ceza alıyorum ve bu da gittikçe yarım saat e kadar gidiyor cidden bu sorunum düzelirse çok iyi olur onun dışında oyun bana baya zevk verdi.

生存者（サバイバー）が暮らす霧の森に迷い込んだ殺人鬼（キラー）が、
「儀式」という名のサバイバー達の余興に利用されて、生存者に虐め倒される唯一性のある新しいゲームです。

そんな中でキラーはいかにサバイバーを追い詰めるかが問われ、全力を尽くしますが、
運営はサバイバーのご機嫌を伺いながら、キラー側の選択肢を奪っていきます。
ドMの方に是非お薦めしたい作品です！！
